name: 陳紅章
objective:
本課程介紹主題包括基本的影像處理算法，如直方圖均衡化；影像濾波與卷積；輪廓提取、霍夫變換，以及模式辨識與分類。
This course introduce basic image processing algorithm such as histogram equalization; Image Filtering and Convolution; Contour Extractions, Hough Transform , Pattern Recognition and Classification
schedule:
Weeks 1-2: Introduction to Image and Signal Processing
Overview of image and signal processing
Basics of digital image representation
Introduction to MATLAB or Python for image and signal processing

Weeks 3-4: Image Enhancement Techniques
Histogram equalization
Spatial domain methods (smoothing, sharpening)
Frequency domain methods (Fourier transform)

Weeks 5-6: Image Filtering and Convolution
Convolution operation
Linear and nonlinear filtering
Edge detection techniques

Weeks 7-8: Image Transformations
Image rotation, scaling, and translation
Geometric transformations
Introduction to wavelet transforms

Weeks 9-10: Image Segmentation
Thresholding methods
Region-based segmentation
Clustering algorithms for segmentation

Weeks 11-12: Image Feature Extraction
Feature extraction techniques
Corner detection and Harris corner detector
SIFT and SURF feature descriptors

Weeks 13-14: Introduction to Signal Recognition
Overview of signal recognition
Signal processing techniques
Feature extraction from signals

Weeks 15-16: Pattern Recognition and Classification
Introduction to pattern recognition
Supervised and unsupervised learning
Classification algorithms (e.g., SVM, k-NN)

Weeks 17-18: Final Project and Review
Application of image and signal recognition techniques in a final project
Review of key concepts
Preparation for final assessments
materials: "Image Processing, Analysis, and Machine Vision" by Milan Sonka, Vaclav Hlavac, and Roger Boyle
